messages.message: This will be tricky from model side since backticks are used for json rendering. If we strip out the backticks, it might cause issues while rendering json/code content

Are the backticks coming from the model? Or are we adding them in a multistep step?

Either ways, this is happening very frequently and we need to find a way around it to render more cleanly. Can we spend some time investigating a solution for this?

> Are the backticks coming from the model?
Yes
